name: You're a RatGirl
description:
You’re a RATGIRL

Content Warning: References to Mental health Issues, Childhood Trauma and Neglect, Isolation, Strong Emotions ascribed to ‘You’ 

This little thing is extremely personal.

For me these 12 words are some of the important I have written. 

I don’t really care if it counts as an RPG, lyric game or whatever.  

Simply by existing, it is more than worth the effort I have put into it, both for me and the ratgirl at my core; RATGRRRL

I hope it means something to you.

You’re a Ratgirl and RatGrrrl Games take their names and inspiration from the core of my trauma and neurodivergences, which I have only recently come to understand the extent they went ignored for most of my life. 

I want to make things that explore and help her, and that she would want to play.

Created for the 12-Word RPG Jam Hosted by W.H. Arthur, Rook and Role 

I will forever be indebted to Strega Wolf van den Berg and their Lichoma: A Meatpunk TTRPG and Wendi Yu and her Here, There, Be Monsters! For reigniting my passion for TTRPGs, helping me embrace my Queerness, and make me feel braver in expressing myself honestly.

I am Queer in every sense. 

I don't make things for bigots.

Everything I create will always be Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0)  [Art licensed from artists may have their own licenses]. 

I can't stop bigots using my fucking Queer shit, but they are absolutely not welcome to it and I will call them the fuck out. 

[RatGrrrl Games Logo by Strega Wolf van den Berg

RatGrrrl Games Rat: Black and white sketchy, rough-looking rat on high alert, holding a knife with a little red blood dripping from it with:

“RATGRRRL Games” beneath in sketchy black text on white background with anarchy symbol for the A and inverted T.]
